INSERT INTO TB_S020.TB_S020_ORG010 ( ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, TEL_NO, CREATE_OBJECT_ID, CREATE_TIMESTAMP, CREATE_PROGRAM_ID, LAST_OBJECT_ID, UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID, ORG_CODE ) SELECT NEXTVAL(tb_s020.sq_s020_member010), #{orgName}, -- 단체명 #{zipCode}, -- 우편번호 #{address}, -- 주소 #{detailAddress}, -- 상세주소 CONCAT(IFNULL(#{firstTelNo}, ''), '-', IFNULL(#{middleTelNo}, ''), '-', IFNULL(#{lastTelNo}, '')), 'TEST', -- 로그인한 정보의 로그인ID => 2022.09.06 추가 수정사항 SYSDATE(), 'S021100020', 'TEST', -- 로그인한 정보의 로그인ID => 2022.09.06 추가 수정사항 SYSDATE(), 'S021100020', CASE WHEN ASCII(MAX(ORG_CODE)) = 0 THEN 'AAA' WHEN SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 3) != 'Z' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 1, 1), SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 2, 1), CHR(ASCII(SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 3)) + 1)) WHEN SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 3) = 'Z' AND SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 2, 1) != 'Z' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 1, 1), CHR(ASCII(SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 2, 1)) +1), 'A') WHEN SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 3) = 'Z' AND SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 2, 1) = 'Z' AND SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 1, 1) != 'Z' THEN CONCAT(CHR(ASCII(SUBSTRING(MAX(ORG_CODE), 1, 1)) + 1), 'A', 'A') ELSE '999' END FROM TB_S020.TB_S020_ORG010
